turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like Ventee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So let me confirmÂ  a Venti cherry mocha with almond milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of flavors can I add to that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What flavors can I add to the milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can add vanilla, chocolate or strawberry syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add chocolate syrup to it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: San Antonio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks in San Antonio.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Narrow it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
